headline: Comcast (CMCSA) Valuation Check As Universal Ads Taps David Shaw For Global Expansion
summary: Comcast (CMCSA) has put its advertising arm back in focus after Universal Ads hired David Shaw to lead global expansion, with the UK identified as the next key market following US progress. See our latest analysis for Comcast. Despite Comcast’s push to grow Universal Ads and expand its Xfinity footprint, the share price is at US$28.16, with a 30 day share price return showing a 4.77% decline and a 1 year total shareholder return showing a 15.35% decline, suggesting momentum has been fading...
